bill.title: Special assessment, certain; require tax collector to pay to board of supervisors when property is sold at a tax sale.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-41-59, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require Tax Collectors To Pay To The Board Of Supervisors Of Any County The Amount Of The Special Assessment For Delinquent Garbage Fees When Real Property Is Sold At A Tax Sale If Such Fees Have Been Levied As A Special Assessment Against The Property And Placed On The Annual Tax Rolls Of The County; To Amend Section 27-45-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require Chancery Clerks To Pay The Board Of Supervisors Of Any County The Amount Owed For The Special Assessment For Delinquent Garbage Fees If Such Property Is Redeemed; And For Related Purposes.
